H0.text: who gets the golden boot if its a tie. The player with the most assists

H1.text: who gets the golden boot if its a tie. The player who scored the fastest goal

H2.text: who gets the golden boot if its a tie. The player with the most goals in the knockout stage

H3.text: who gets the golden boot if its a tie. shared

A4.text: If there is more than one player with the same number of goals, since 1994 the tie-breaker goes to the player with more assists.

A5.text: If there is still more than one player, the tie (since 2006) is decided by minutes played in the tournament, with the player playing fewest minutes ranked first.
